Home About Kitties

A place for looking cat pictures

The true purpose of the Internet

Images and videos of domestic cats make up some of the most viewed content on the web, particularly image macros in the form of lolcats. ThoughtCatalog has described cats as the "unofficial mascot of the Internet".[1] Cats as human companions "are now sharing not only people's real life but also their virtual world" as a scientific study points out.[2]

From Wikipedia Cat's and the Internet

A Monster Cat

What we love about me!
an account by our cat named monster

I am Monster. Here me meow! I will greet you (loudly) at the door. I exist to grab your attention. Sometimes my methods are subtle, and at other times I may destroy many dollars worth of electronics to pry you away from your current endevors. I love my humans, boxes, and basically anything I can chew on.

Currently living at 178 Carroll St, Keene, NH


My top 3 favorite things about Monster

  1. Extreme friendliness
  2. Social apptitude
  3. Trusting and swee nature

Other things about Monster

  • She likes to try to escape.
  • She likes wet food better than dry.
  • She does not play well with other kitties.

A Mystical Kitty

A Mystical Kitty.

What we love about me!
an account by the Mystical Kitty.

I am the Mystical Kitty. Watch me gaze into your eyes. I can see that you like kitties. Now fetch me some catnip before I retire to bed.

Living on the ethereal plane


My top 3 favorite things about the Mystical Kitty

  1. Intense Eyes
  2. Spirit Sense
  3. Soft Fur

Other things about the Mystical Kitty

  • Likes to peer deeply into your soul.
  • Likes to move stealthily.
  • Photographs well in black & white.

A very fluffy kitty

A very fluffy kitty.

What we love about me!
an account by the fluffy kitty.

I am the Fluffy Kitty. Behold my fluffiness! I have joined the other kitties on this page to claim the rightful spot of long-haired beauties. Isn't it just so fun that there are so many kitties?

Living somewhere nearby you.


My top 3 favorite things about the Fluffy Kitty

  1. Most colorful kitty on this page.
  2. Has a fun shape.
  3. Wonderful fluff. Great that we don't have to vacuum.

Other things about the Fluffy Kitty

  • No need to vacuum for this kitty. She's virtual.
  • Provides quizzical looks.
  • Enjoys nuzzling.
